summary: Waste is unwanted materials and objects that people have thrown away.
full_text:
Waste and wastes are unwanted or unusable materials. Waste is any substance which is discarded after primary use, or it is worthless, defective and of no use.
The term is often subjective  and sometimes objectively inaccurate . Examples include municipal solid waste , hazardous waste, wastewater , radioactive waste, and others.
title: Waste
